about_the_game:
Ready to feel the pressure of a fresh produce warehouse ?
Can you keep up with the demand ?

Managing the Flow

Order products from the supplier.


Receive and transport the pallets to the loading dock.
Dispatch the pallets on different pending orders.

Handling the Pressure

But watch out, things heat up fast ! Orders flood in, deadlines shorten, and unexpected events occur.
You'll need to stay cool-headed to make it through.

Watch Out for the Unexpected

From power outages to server crashes, you never know what's coming.
Stay sharp and think on your feet to keep the operation running smoothly!

Bonuses and Upgrades

Get bonuses to help you gain some breathing room when things get intense, like express delivery or slow motion.
Improve your setup with upgrades that'll streamline your operation, like pallet size or increased order prep time.

Game Modes

Arcade: Test your mettle with random bonuses and upgrades, aiming to rack up points before hitting the limit of missed orders.
Career: Manage your resources wisely, buying bonuses and upgrades at the end of each day to stay afloat as long as possible.

Achievements

Earn all the stars for each warehouse and game mode.
Leaderboard: See how you stack up against other players.

name: Dispatch Madness

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i5 6xxx or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GTX 650 or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel i5 10xxx or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GTX 1060 or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Manage the flow of a fresh produce warehouse ! Place orders with suppliers, handle incoming pallets, and dispatch them from the loading bay to your customers. Stay cool under pressure ! Deal with the increasing pressure and unexpected events.
